gmd:title: SoilGrids250m - Depth to bedrock (R horizon) up to 200 cm
Description: Depth to bedrock (R horizon) up to 200 cm
gmd:abstract: Depth to bedrock (R horizon) up to 200 cm predicted using the global compilation of soil ground observations. Accuracy assessement of the maps is availble in Hengl et at. (2017) DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0169748. Data provided as GeoTIFFs with internal compression (co='COMPRESS=DEFLATE'). Measurement units: cm. To visualize these layers or request a support please use www.soilgrids.org. SoilGrids predictions are updated every 3–6 months depending on the addition of new training points. Last update: 2017-08-10

SoilGrids predictions are updated every 3–6 months depending on the addition of new training points. Last update: 2017-08-10
